Hey hey hey!

Auctioning this short domain name.

Domain: txto (dot) me
Expiry: 11m

Rules:

  1. The starting price for the domain name is $5, with a bid increment of $1 (minimum).

Payment Method:

  • PayPal (Payment to be made within 24 hours from end of auction. Winner covers PayPal fees, if any.)

Domain Transfer Options:

  1. Pushed within PorkBun.
  2. EPP/AUTH code will be provided to the winner should the winner chooses to have the domain name transferred out of PorkBun, to a different registrar. Winner takes the cost for the transfer.

Auction Ends:
Tuesday, 31 December 2019, 00:00:00 (EST)

Happy Holidays!
